body_html:
@apaszke , Thanks. I personally am interested in those CDF-related functions. For example,
(i) the upper and lower incomplete gamma functions (it would be great if we could integrate the corresponding scaled versions, as inplemented in MATLAB as Y = gammainc(X,A,'scaledupper') or gammainc(X,A,'scaledlower'));
(ii) the incomplete beta function;
(iii) the generalized generalized hypergeometric function pFq();
(iv) the meijer G-function.
These functions are mainly used to calculate CDFs or the corresponding derivatives.
Thanks again for your great work.
